items.name: Riot shield
items.info: smuggled from the local police station

items.name: Metal vault
items.info: keep envious eyes away from stealing your fortune

items.name: Underwater vault
items.info: face it: your metal vault got broken last week, huh? Try placing it at the sea floor

items.name: Guarded vault
items.info: tired of having your money stolen everytime? Hire some trained guards to keep an eye on your treasure!

items.name: Military vault
items.info: the likelyhood of getting your belongings stolen is nearly zero when you have soldiers respecting your wealth
